articles.title: Apple to slow-roll AI features on iPhones, iPads and Mac PCs: 4 reasons why it may be beneficial for the - The Times of India
articles.description: TECH NEWS : Apple launched AI features at WWDC. Features coming in late 2024 and early 2025. Shift in rollout strategy noted by Mark Gurman.

articles.author: Ali Mashayek, Sophie Meyjes, Tyler Rohr
articles.title: Marine CO₂ removal technologies could depend on the appetite of the ocean's tiniest animals - The Conversation Indonesia
articles.description: Taking more carbon dioxide out of the atmosphere by stashing it in the ocean seems like a good idea, but it could backfire if tiny marine animals called zooplankton get extra hungry.
